title: Force Motors partners with EY Parthenon India for digital transformation program
content: Force Motors has partnered with EY Parthenon India to undertake a digital transformation programme aimed at boosting innovation and productivity across its value chain. The collaboration will focus on redesigning Force Motors' digital landscape, implementing advanced digital platforms, technologies, and solutions for customers, and enhancing its capabilities and security.
summary: Force Motors has partnered with EY Parthenon India to undertake a digital transformation programme aimed at boosting innovation and productivity across its value chain. The collaboration will focus on redesigning Force Motors' digital landscape, implementing advanced digital platforms, technologies, and solutions for customers, and enhancing its capabilities and security.

title: CDK Global begins to restore systems after cyber hack
content: CDK Global is working to restore systems for 15,000 auto retailers after a cyber incident. Hackers demanded ransom to end the hack.
summary: CDK Global is working to restore systems for 15,000 auto retailers after a cyber incident. Hackers demanded ransom to end the hack.

title: Indian and EU startups pitch for cooperation in EV technologies
content: The India-European Union Trade and Technology Council (TTC) Working Group 2 on Friday held a pivotal start-up matchmaking event aimed at advancing battery recycling technologies for electric vehicles (EVs). According to a press release, the event, which took place in New Delhi, featured twelve promising start-ups from both India and the EU, reflecting a shared commitment to innovation, sustainability, and stronger economic ties between the two regions.
summary: The India-European Union Trade and Technology Council (TTC) Working Group 2 on Friday held a pivotal start-up matchmaking event aimed at advancing battery recycling technologies for electric vehicles (EVs). According to a press release, the event, which took place in New Delhi, featured twelve promising start-ups from both India and the EU, reflecting a shared commitment to innovation, sustainability, and stronger economic ties between the two regions.

title: Altair ups the ante in simulation, data analytics for automakers
content: The US-headquartered company is betting big on India’s auto industry for optimal use of its competencies in simulation and data analytics. The leadership team is confident that the sky’s the limit and business is poised for tremendous growth in the coming decade.
summary: The US-headquartered company is betting big on India’s auto industry for optimal use of its competencies in simulation and data analytics. The leadership team is confident that the sky’s the limit and business is poised for tremendous growth in the coming decade.

title: NHAI taking AI route for better road signs to improve safety
content: In order to enhance road safety, NHAI has signed an MoU with Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology (IIIT), Delhi, a technical university established by the Delhi government, to leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) based solutions for improvement in the availability of road signs on national highways.
summary: In order to enhance road safety, NHAI has signed an MoU with Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology (IIIT), Delhi, a technical university established by the Delhi government, to leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) based solutions for improvement in the availability of road signs on national highways.

title: The Imperative Shift to Industry 4.0 for Indian Automakers: A New Era of Transformation
content: The Indian automotive industry has evolved significantly with the advent of Industry 4.0, impacting auto component manufacturers. The transition involves adopting advanced technologies like IIoT and machine-to-machine connectivity. Industry 4.0 enhances supply chain visibility and is crucial for global competitiveness.
summary: The Indian automotive industry has evolved significantly with the advent of Industry 4.0, impacting auto component manufacturers. The transition involves adopting advanced technologies like IIoT and machine-to-machine connectivity. Industry 4.0 enhances supply chain visibility and is crucial for global competitiveness.

title: M&M advances digital transformation with Dassault Systemes 3DEXPERIENCE Platform on the Cloud
content: Mahindra & Mahindra is advancing its digital transformation by selecting Dassault Systèmes’ 3DEXPERIENCE platform on the cloud to accelerate new product development.
summary: Mahindra & Mahindra is advancing its digital transformation by selecting Dassault Systèmes’ 3DEXPERIENCE platform on the cloud to accelerate new product development.

title: ETAuto Tech Summit 2024: Software, sustainability, cybersecurity to define the future of auto industry
content: Henrik Fisker, CEO of Fisker Inc, addressed the global demand for electric vehicles at the ETAuto Tech Summit, emphasizing the irreversible shift towards EVs.
summary: Henrik Fisker, CEO of Fisker Inc, addressed the global demand for electric vehicles at the ETAuto Tech Summit, emphasizing the irreversible shift towards EVs.

title: KR Fuels obtains approval for LPG conversion in 2Ws
content: KR Fuels secures approval to retrofit LPG into BS4 two-wheelers in India, offering eco-friendly solutions with precision-manufactured kits at Trichy facility.
summary: KR Fuels secures approval to retrofit LPG into BS4 two-wheelers in India, offering eco-friendly solutions with precision-manufactured kits at Trichy facility.

title: Boult launches CruiseCam to enhance road safety and connectivity
content: The Boult CruiseCam X1 and X1 GPS are now offered at introductory prices of INR 2,999 and INR 3,999, respectively. These cameras can be purchased on Amazon, Flipkart, and on the company's official website, the company stated in its media release.
summary: The Boult CruiseCam X1 and X1 GPS are now offered at introductory prices of INR 2,999 and INR 3,999, respectively. These cameras can be purchased on Amazon, Flipkart, and on the company's official website, the company stated in its media release.

title: Deloitte unveils 'Fuels of the future' report at the 5th edition of ETAutoTech Summit 2024
content: Deloitte India launched a report on alternative fuel options at the ETAutoTech Summit 2024, highlighting India's shift towards sustainable energy. The report mentions the FAME III scheme funding for cleaner transport solutions.
summary: Deloitte India launched a report on alternative fuel options at the ETAutoTech Summit 2024, highlighting India's shift towards sustainable energy. The report mentions the FAME III scheme funding for cleaner transport solutions.

title: China approves autonomous driving startup Momenta's US IPO
content: China in June granted approval to a first group of nine automakers to carry out tests on vehicles with advanced autonomous driving technologies on public roads, as part of a plan to accelerate adoption of self-driving cars.
summary: China in June granted approval to a first group of nine automakers to carry out tests on vehicles with advanced autonomous driving technologies on public roads, as part of a plan to accelerate adoption of self-driving cars.

title: ETAutoTech Summit 2024 kick-starts today, themed ‘Engineering Sustainable Transition’
content: ETAuto announces 5th Tech Summit on 'Engineering Sustainable Transition' in Bengaluru at Sheraton Grand Hotel. Indian and international technocrats and experts are assembling in this two-day mega event (June 20 and 21) to discuss and debate on the present cutting-edge technology trends, and also to peep into the automotive technology landscape of tomorrow.
summary: ETAuto announces 5th Tech Summit on 'Engineering Sustainable Transition' in Bengaluru at Sheraton Grand Hotel. Indian and international technocrats and experts are assembling in this two-day mega event (June 20 and 21) to discuss and debate on the present cutting-edge technology trends, and also to peep into the automotive technology landscape of tomorrow.

title: Tata Technologies launches 2nd edition of InnoVent Hackathon with Microsoft and Tata Motors
content: Tata Technologies, in partnership with Microsoft and Tata Motors, launches the second edition of the InnoVent hackathon. The event focuses on developing Generative AI-enabled innovations for the manufacturing industry.
summary: Tata Technologies, in partnership with Microsoft and Tata Motors, launches the second edition of the InnoVent hackathon. The event focuses on developing Generative AI-enabled innovations for the manufacturing industry.

title: Stellantis recalling nearly 1.2 mn vehicles to fix software glitch that disables rear camera
content: The recall covers Jeep Compass, Grand Cherokee, Wagoneer and Grand Wagoneer SUVs from the 2022 and 2023 model years. Also included are Ram ProMaster vans from 2022 and 2023, as well as the Ram 3500 chassis cabs and Ram 1500 and 2500 pickups from 2022. Also covered are 2021 through 2023 Chrysler Pacifica minivans and Jeep Grand Cherokee L SUVs, and 2021 and 2022 Dodge Durango SUVs.
summary: The recall covers Jeep Compass, Grand Cherokee, Wagoneer and Grand Wagoneer SUVs from the 2022 and 2023 model years. Also included are Ram ProMaster vans from 2022 and 2023, as well as the Ram 3500 chassis cabs and Ram 1500 and 2500 pickups from 2022. Also covered are 2021 through 2023 Chrysler Pacifica minivans and Jeep Grand Cherokee L SUVs, and 2021 and 2022 Dodge Durango SUVs.

title: Volvo Trucks enters LNG truck segment in India, fuel technology ‘first step’ towards its 2040 carbon neutrality target
content: The European truck major, and partner to India’s Eicher Motors, finds the first Indian customer in logistics company Delhivery. Volvo Trucks looks to leverage India more in terms of localisation sourcing, and technology development.
summary: The European truck major, and partner to India’s Eicher Motors, finds the first Indian customer in logistics company Delhivery. Volvo Trucks looks to leverage India more in terms of localisation sourcing, and technology development.

title: Hyundai Motor Company president Jaehoon Chang named co-chair of Hydrogen Council
content: Together, they will collaborate with Hydrogen Council member CEOs as the organization enters a new phase. This phase will focus on harnessing the global demand for hydrogen and creating a framework for international trade and investment.
summary: Together, they will collaborate with Hydrogen Council member CEOs as the organization enters a new phase. This phase will focus on harnessing the global demand for hydrogen and creating a framework for international trade and investment.

title: Clean Electric unveils revolutionary 12-minute charging battery technology for electric vehicles
content: ​​The company's proprietary battery technology uses universal CCS 2 DC charging standards, ensuring compatibility across all EV models form-factors, positioning it as a game-changer for the entire industry. The fireproof batteries had been tested for 3700 rapid charge cycles with only 11% degradation in the overall range. The energy storage solution firm manufactures the batteries at its state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in Pune, the plant is well equipped to produce up to 1200 battery packs per month the company said in its media release.
summary: ​​The company's proprietary battery technology uses universal CCS 2 DC charging standards, ensuring compatibility across all EV models form-factors, positioning it as a game-changer for the entire industry. The fireproof batteries had been tested for 3700 rapid charge cycles with only 11% degradation in the overall range. The energy storage solution firm manufactures the batteries at its state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in Pune, the plant is well equipped to produce up to 1200 battery packs per month the company said in its media release.

title: Haryana man builds wooden electric Bullet motorcycle. Video goes viral
content: The bike, crafted from a blend of wood and electric components, not only operates smoothly but also replicates the beloved 'dug dug' exhaust sound of a traditional Bullet motorcycle. The creator elaborates on the bike's features in the video, highlighting the wooden tank that houses a stereo system controlling the sound emitted from speakers inside a wooden exhaust pipe.
summary: The bike, crafted from a blend of wood and electric components, not only operates smoothly but also replicates the beloved 'dug dug' exhaust sound of a traditional Bullet motorcycle. The creator elaborates on the bike's features in the video, highlighting the wooden tank that houses a stereo system controlling the sound emitted from speakers inside a wooden exhaust pipe.

title: Shanghai allows Tesla to carry out full self-driving pilot
content: A successful rollout of its Full Self-Driving (FSD) software would allow Tesla to better compete with local rivals in China, and could turn the world's largest auto market into a battlefield for less expensive driver assistance features, intensifying a price war.
summary: A successful rollout of its Full Self-Driving (FSD) software would allow Tesla to better compete with local rivals in China, and could turn the world's largest auto market into a battlefield for less expensive driver assistance features, intensifying a price war.
